title: The Color Matches
author: VD
content_html: The Bloodhound does his thing in MIDNIGHT’S WAR: NIGHT STREETS. The Legend has finished the final script and Ademir is now illustrating the last 24 pages, so we’ll almost certainly be getting the omnibus out to backers this year.
content_text:
The Bloodhound
does his thing
in
MIDNIGHT’S WAR: NIGHT STREETS
. The Legend has finished the final script and Ademir is now illustrating the last 24 pages, so we’ll almost certainly be getting the omnibus out to backers this year.
